title: Expression of Interest - 2024 Early Careers Opportunities
content:
We are looking for expressions of interest for our Early Careers Opportunities which will commence in 2024 and will be available at our JD Sports head office location in Bury (BL9 8RR) as well as our Distribution Centre in Rochdale (OL16 4GR).  
ABOUT OUR EARLY CAREERS OPPORTUNITIES 
We believe everyone deserves a chance. The JD Early Careers team breaks down barriers to provide opportunities for people from all backgrounds. We do this by offering work experience, tools to succeed, support, advice and guidance which allows us to connect, inspire and empower the next generation. As a business, the potential of the new generation of talent is essential to our success.
We’re mindful that we’re looking for the best, most diverse, representative talent. From pre-to post-qualification programmes and entry-level roles, we have positions to suit a wide range of candidates.
EXPRESS YOUR INTEREST IN:

2024 Summer Internship (3-Month Internship - commences in June 2024)
2024 Placement Year (commences July 2024)
2024 Graduate Programme (commences September 2024)

ABOUT THE COMPANY
Established in 1981 with a single store in the Northwest of England, the JD Group is a leading omni-channel retailer of Sports Fashion, Street & Premium Fashion, Outdoors and Gyms with over 60,000 colleagues and over 3,400 stores across several retail fascias in over 30 markets around the world.
JD Sports Fashion Plc was listed on the London Stock Exchange in 1996 and has been a FTSE100 publicly quoted company since 2019 and continues to grow in the UK and internationally.
We want to be the leading global omni-channel retailer in the sports, fashion, and outdoor industry. To be a part of this successful company and help us to achieve this you will have the desire to ingrain our strategic goals of being a people-led, innovative and customer-focused organisation which provides operational excellence whilst identifying new areas of growth as part of our day to day objectives.
NEXT STEPS
If you would like to register your interest in our Early Careers opportunities for 2024, please submit this below.
Once the specific job ads go live for the opportunity within the area you have expressed interest for, we will be in contact via email to alert you that the ad is now live for you to have the opportunity to submit your formal application.
Please note, you do not need to submit a CV or Cover letter in your expression of interest, this will only be required in your formal application.
